Message.Title: OBAMA A COWART !!! WE NEED A REAL AMERICA PRESIDENT LIKE MITT ROMNEY !!!!

Message.Msg: as per usual , especially for er's that don't please , IBM comes out with a major announcement about 2 weeks after .... the semi industry has been anticipating the limits of silicon and has been scrambling for the next platform ... now , IBM announces a practical nano tube technology .... later .... garce
